feed.title: SAP Community - SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud
feed.subtitle: SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: Referencing New Entity in Batch Request
entry.content:
Dear Community

I have a question on how to reference new entity that will be created in the same changeset from a subsequent request.

■Goal

・Creating a billing document

・Referencing new entity ( Billing Document Number that will be created) and posting it to accounting

・If posting it to accounting failed, the billing document should not be created at all (keep atomicity)

--request-separator
Content-Type:multipart/mixed;boundary=changeset
content-id:1

--changeset
Content-Type:application/http
content-id:1

POST BillingDocument/SAP__self.CreateFromSDDocument HTTP/1.1
Content-Type: application/json
Accept: application/json
if-match:*

{"_Reference":[{"SDDocument":"80000858"}]}
--changeset
Content-Type:application/http
content-id:2

POST $1/SAP__self.PostToAccounting HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json
if-match:*


--changeset--
--request-separator--

 ■Problem

$1 did not work saying "Content ID '$1' is not valid".

--06CCB59B6843C50D33ABAC61925ECE6E0
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Length: 959
content-transfer-encoding: binary
content-id: 2

HTTP/1.1 404 Not Found
Content-Type: application/json;odata.metadata=minimal;charset=utf-8
Content-Length: 778
sap-cache-control: -u
content-language: en
odata-version: 4.0

{"error":{"code":"/IWCOR/CX_OD_URI_NOT_MATCHING/42010AEF0CEE1EDCA3E48032225B84BB","message":"Content ID '$1' is not valid","@SAP__common.ExceptionCategory":"Client_Error","innererror":{"ErrorDetails":{"@SAP__common.Application":{"ComponentId":"SD-BIL","ServiceRepository":"SRVD_A2X","ServiceId":"API_BILLINGDOCUMENT","ServiceVersion":"0001"},"@SAP__common.TransactionId":"600414ADECD10170E0068A6D084EE041","@SAP__common.Timestamp":"20250822021139.726132","@SAP__common.ErrorResolution":{"Analysis":"Use ADT feed reader \"SAP Gateway Error Log\" or run transaction /IWFND/ERROR_LOG on SAP Gateway hub system and search for entries with the timestamp above for more details","Note":"See SAP Note 1797736 for error analysis (https://service.sap.com/sap/support/notes/1797736)"}}}}}
--06CCB59B6843C50D33ABAC61925ECE6E0--

 I would appreciate it if you would let me know anything related to this!

Thanks&Regards

entry.title: Manage Withholding Tax Items Peru – Issue with Reporting Date not moving to correct Fiscal Period
entry.content:
Hi Experts,

I am using the app Manage Withholding Tax Items for Peru Localization to change the Withholding Tax Reporting Date from 01.07.2025 to 21.08.2025 for a supplier invoice (1300000010) that has a WHT type at invoice posting.

I tried the following options:

  • Exclude option:
    When I run the report for Period August (01.08.2025–31.08.2025) and set the Reporting Date 01.08.2025–31.08.2025 as a parameter, the invoice does not appear.

    When I run the report for Period July (01.07.2025–31.07.2025) with Reporting Date 01.07.2025–31.07.2025, the invoice appears, but the Tax Period is 202508.

  • Holding option:
    When I run the report again for Period July with the same parameters, the invoice appears, but the Tax Period is 999912, which should not be correct.

  • Include option:
    I tried to include the invoice in Period August, but the invoice still does not appear in that period.

I have reviewed the Help Portal, and it seems that the app is not working as expected, since it does not move the invoice to the correct reporting period.

Thanks in advance for your support!

SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition Service SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition Extensibility Localization

entry.title: I can't to assign a recipient name to a namespace "/MMIM" .
entry.content:
I want to assign a recipient name to some users with a namespace "/MMIM" to ensure the connection between an S/4 HANA Public Cloud and a Business Network application. 

However, on Assign recipients to users app, I can't choose any recipient name; any values don't show up on a screen.
We already figured out that this issue also occurred on the 2502 version of public cloud and potentially solved. But it's still happening in the 2508 version of the public cloud.

The support engineer on SAP who is in charge of technical guidance for our project, he already checked that he found a recipient name for the namespace "/MMIM" on a 2508 of sandbox S/4 HANA Public Cloud.

For anyone who has some clues for this issue,  I'd appreciate it if you kindly share the way we fix this issue.

Thank you so much.

entry.title: Replacement for the deprecated catalog “SAP_CMD_BC_BP_MASSMAINT_PC”
entry.content:
Hi All,

In SAP S/4HANA Cloud public edition, I'm trying to find a replacement for the business catalog

"SAP_CMD_BC_BP_MASSMAINT_PC (Mass Maintenance - Business Partner Master (Deprecated))",

which has been deprecated in the new version.

Could anyone please tell me what the new, alternative business catalog is?

Alternatively, any guidance on how to find the replacement catalog would be extremely helpful. I can look for it myself if I know the right method.

Best regards.

entry.title: Custom field in SAP EWM Public cloud
entry.content:
Hello Team,

 

First Requirement: We need a supplier information to be captured into EWM Public Cloud, for example Truck number, number of trucks for inbound, Mode of carrier, etc. in a custom field, from S4 Inbound Delivery to EWM system.

 

2nd Requirement: I want to add a Material Group under "Stock & Bin" Node under "Physical/Available Stock" in Warehouse Monitor

 

The above 2 requirements are very much important and topmost priority for us to deliver to Client. I hope we will get a positive response from you at the earliest. I am raising this a very High priority Issue

 

Regards!!

 

Debojit

 


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Learn more about the SAP Support user and program here.

entry.title: Limitation in SAP RFID Handling unit number series Length
entry.content:
We have integration between a third party RFID solution with SAP. The challenge is with the Handling unit number series length:

 

  • The Third Party RFID solution supports 28 character length
  • SAP HU number series is restricted to a maximum of character length.

 

This limitation is causing integration issues. we need feasible solution or workaround where the HU numbers from the third-party RFID can be aligned with SAP. Request your urgent guidance as this is very critical for our go live.

 


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Learn more about the SAP Support user and program here.

entry.title: Situation Handling Extended framework (Email notification) in SAP public cloud 3 system landscape
entry.content:
Dear experts,

I have created one Situation Handling using situation handling extended framework.
The Situation will trigger when PO created and the notification is showing in the Fiori launchpad but i am not getting Email notification.
Steps that i have done are
1. Manage situation objects
2. Manage situation scenarios
3. Manage Situation Types - Extended - 
     a. Created Situation Templates
     b. Created Situation Types
But the notification is not triggering 

Please suggest how to trigger Email notification for the situation.

entry.title: Vertex Tax Integration – Restrict Usage to Sales Transactions Only
entry.content:
We are currently observing that tax amounts are returning as zero for customer invoices, even though Vertex is integrated and should be calculating tax correctly on the sales side.

Interestingly, tax amounts and percentages are being returned correctly for vendor invoices, but our business requirement is to use Vertex exclusively for sales-side (customer) transactions, not for purchasing.

We would like to:

  1. Restrict Vertex tax calculation calls to only sales transactions (e.g., customer invoices, sales orders).

  2. Prevent Vertex from being invoked for purchasing transactions (e.g., vendor invoices, purchase orders).

  3. Resolve the issue where customer invoices are returning zero tax, despite Vertex being expected to handle tax calculation.

Please advise on the necessary configuration or user exit/BADI enhancements required to achieve this behavior within SAP.

entry.title: Virtual Card Payment Setup
entry.content:
Hi All,

Our organisation is running SAP S/4HANA Cloud, Public Edition and is planning to introduce Virtual Card as one of the payment methods for vendor payments.

However, we do not have SAP Multi-Bank Connectivity (MBC) or SAP Concur Invoice in our landscape.

Could someone please advise:

  • How the end-to-end process for virtual card payments would look in this scenario, and

  • What configuration steps are needed to set it up in S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition?

Any guidance, best practices, or experience sharing would be greatly appreciated.

Thank you!

Monali

entry.title: Error occurred while integrating SAP GRDC with S4HANA for Public Cloud
entry.content:
Hello Expert,

We’ve successfully created a Subaccount for SAP GRDC and established trust with the respective tenant. All relevant roles have been assigned to ABCD ID, and the destination for GRDC has also been configured.

However, during the connection test, we’re encountering a 302 error. 

In S4HANA Side :

We have created Communication User, Communication System and Communication Arrangement (SAP_COMM_0241).We are referring the SAP Document for this (Step 7).


But while we click on Manage Packages, we are getting  this error :

Can't get the global parameters from the SAP S/4HANA system. Can't retrieve the definition for destinations S4HanaCConsoEndpoint or S4HanaCConsoEndpoint_RFC: Failed to read authentication token of destination 'S4HanaCConsoEndpoint'. The destination service responded with an error: 'Provided authorization grant is invalid. Exception was No user found with alias 'ABCD@xyz.com' (format: unspecified). For more information, consult the kernel traces or the OAuth 2.0 trouble shooting SAP note 1688545'. In case only the properties of a destination should be accessed, without performing authorization flows, please use the 'getDestinationProperties' method on 'DestinationService' instead..


FUNCTIONAL_EXCEPTION Can't retrieve the definition for destinations S4HanaCConsoEndpoint or S4HanaCConsoEndpoint_RFC: Failed to read authentication token of destination 'S4HanaCConsoEndpoint'. The destination service responded with an error: 'Provided authorization grant is invalid. Exception was No user found with alias 'ABCD@xyz.com' (format: unspecified). For more information, consult the kernel traces or the OAuth 2.0 trouble shooting SAP note 1688545'. In case only the properties of a destination should be accessed, without performing authorization flows, please use the 'getDestinationProperties' method on 'DestinationService' instead.

While we click on Define Data Mapping :
We got this error (Can't load the metadata from the SAP S/4HANA system.
Contact your system administrator with this log ID: )

This issue is blocking further progress, and resolving it is critical due to multiple dependencies.

Please help us with this.

Thanks in advance.

Antra Ansari

entry.title: Additional Charges in Sales Invoice
entry.content:
Hello experts,

My client needs to record a delivery charges in Sales invoice without hitting the Revenue G/L account. Their scenario is that they collect Delivery charges from the Customer and deliver the Goods by themself and record that charges in the Sales invoice additionally. How can  we do this ?

entry.title: Recreate interface data which was triggerred by Event Mesh
entry.content:
Dear SAP Specialists,

We are building interfaces from S/4HANA cloud to the other systems via BTP Integration Suite.
Some of them are triggerred by Event Mesh function.

Now I am wondering which function (application) can resend the data.
In our integration test, we need to resend the data which has met a trouble. 
It will be required after go-live for a trouble shooting.

Can someone show me the best practices to do it?

Thanks and best regards,

Masatomo Makino

entry.title: Block - Back Date Invoicing
entry.content:
Hi All,

I need support related to Back Date Invoicing, system should not allow to make Back date entry of Invoicing (VF01) in SAP Public Cloud.

So kindly some standard configuration or any custom Badi we need to put in a system so that we can block back date Invoicing.

Thanks, and Regards

Mani Sajnani

entry.title: Activity Cost Rate validity
entry.content:

I maintained plan cost rates for 2025. When checking the rates, they come up with validity 2024, despite they are valid from 1st Jan 2025. Was it maintained incorrect somehow? I used the app Manage Plan Cost Rates (F3162).

Best regards

Anja

entry.title: Quality management configuration assistance
entry.content:
Hi, As per the requirement, we need to create separate inspection lot origins for sample inspections, such as 5-piece, line, and PDI, for different inspection lot types. While attempting to configure this on the server, the option appears grayed out and does not allow me to add the custom inspection lots.

Could you please guide me on how to achieve this? Your support would be highly appreciated.

Best regards,
Aditya

entry.title: Creating a completely custom form in SAP Public Cloud 2508 triggered from MES for Production Complet
entry.content:
Hello Community,

I am working in SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud 2508 and need to generate an output label for Production Operation Notifications that is not available in the standard templates.

The key requirement is that this label should be generated from our MES system when a production order is completed, directly in the notification.

Our goal is to create the label from scratch because there are no templates for the case we need, but we have not found clear documentation on how to do this in Public Cloud, since we usually use existing templates in the Manage Form Templates app and Adobe LiveCycle Designer.

My specific questions are:

  1. Is it possible to create a form completely from scratch in Public Cloud, without relying on predefined templates?

  2. How would the fields from the Production module (e.g., operation notifications) be connected to the form?

  3. Are there recommended alternatives to generate custom labels triggered from the MES system when a production order completes?

Additionally, if anyone has SAP documentation, notes, or guides related to this topic, I would be extremely grateful, as I have found very little information for Public Cloud.

I would greatly appreciate any guidance, examples, or SAP notes that could help address this scenario.

Thank you in advance.

SAP Forms service by Adobe SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition Manufacturing

entry.title: Disable the automatic settlement of production/Process orders through event base in our SAP system
entry.content: I would like to know if it is possible to stop or disable the automatic settlement of production orders through event base in our SAP Public cloud system. Currently, production orders are being automatically settled during the period-end closing process, but for certain business cases, we would like to either control this manually or exclude specific orders or order types from being auto-settled.

entry.title: PM order user status in S/4HANA Public Cloud
entry.content:
Hi SAP experts!

In SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition, I can define status schemes in Customizing (ID 105327), but I cannot select a user status in the master record of a PM order. I also cannot find any indication in the documentation on PM scope items as to whether the user status is now available or not.

Does anyone have an answer/hint/link to this?

Thank you for any information and best regards.

Rado
